Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/28th
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 26th, Kostner, 31st, and Komensky, due to, street blockage near Pulaski/28th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 26th, Kostner, 31st, and Komensky, due to, street blockage near Pulaski/28th.

Allow extra travel time.
